channel.title: Changing where the compass is located?
channel.description: Okay how would i change the compass is located? I got new sprites and the compass is way off. I have tom's cache editor and such.

item.title: Changing where the compass is located?
item.dc:creator: @matthewboi12 matthewboi12
item.description:
@matthewboi12 wrote:

you cant… not that i know of… u have to edit ur sprites and make them soo it fits where the compass is… or edit client and find where the compas is and change where it is set to…

Read full topic
